attributes.action: Public Inquiry into poor management of The Torpoint Ferry and Tamar Bridge
attributes.additional_details: Examples of poor management; Incorrect Chain, No common sense used on scheduling, What is the need for expensive offices when the service is failing ?
attributes.background: The Tamar Bridge and Torpoint Ferry Joint Committee operate the crossings that form a critical part of daily life in South East Cornwall. The service is causing the local communities to suffer through negligence and  bad management. We need and independent look at how they provide a service
